nav.div: Lewis Central Community Schools » News » What's New » COVID-19 Updates

span.span: At Lewis Central, the health and safety of our students and staff is a top priority. With the continued spread and uncertainty around COVID-19, or the Coronavirus, we remain in close contact with local and state health departments to keep abreast of this rapidly changing situation. Our custodians continue to keep our schools as clean and
as possible against all sorts of viruses.

br.br:
We have created a new webpage to keep our school community updated with resources about the Coronavirus as well as the latest information from the school district.
www.lewiscentral.org/covid19
Please know that every decision we make is rooted in what's best for our students and is done with consultation and recommendations from local, state and federal health agencies.
